explanations.manifold learning: The paper explicitly mentions using manifold learning theory to design the stock index model, assuming the stock dataset is a low-dimensional manifold embedded in a higher-dimensional Euclidean space.
explanations.feature learning: The paper discusses detecting feature points on the eigenvectors of the discrete Laplace-Beltrami operator (LBO) matrix, which is related to learning features from the data.
explanations.feature representation: The paper involves constructing a feature representation of the stock dataset through the eigenvectors of the LBO matrix, which is used to select constituent stocks for the index.
